rfpk.spk.spkdb
Class Spkdb

java.lang.Object
  rfpk.spk.spkdb.Spkdb
public abstract class Spkdb
extends java.lang.Object

defines a set of static methods which provide a java API for the Spk Database. This class should never be instantiated.

Constructor Detail

Spkdb

public Spkdb()
Method Detail

connect

public static java.sql.Connection connect(java.lang.String dbName,
                                          java.lang.String hostName,
                                          java.lang.String dbUser,
                                          java.lang.String dbPassword)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          SpkdbException
Open a connection to a database. The object returned must be passed as a parameter to other methods of the Spkdb class. A process may have several connections open at the same time. When a connection is no longer used, it should be closed using the Spkdb.disconnect() method.

Parameters:
dbName - name of a database
hostName - domain name of host on which database resides
dbUser - username of a valid user of the database
dbPassword - user's password
Returns:
an object of type java.sql.Connection
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException
See Also:
disconnect(java.sql.Connection), Connection

disconnect

public static boolean disconnect(java.sql.Connection conn)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Close a database connection.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to a database
Returns:
true
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
connect(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

newJob

public static long newJob(java.sql.Connection conn,
                          long userId,
                          java.lang.String abstraction,
                          long datasetId,
                          java.lang.String datasetVersion,
                          long modelId,
                          java.lang.String modelVersion,
                          java.lang.String xmlSource,
                          java.lang.String methodCode,
                          long parent,
                          boolean isWarmStart)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          SpkdbException,
                          java.io.FileNotFoundException
Submit a job

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to a row in the user table
abstraction - short description of the job
datasetId - key to a row in the dataset table
datasetVersion - rcs version code for the dataset
modelId - key to a rew in the model table
modelVersion - rcs version code for the model
xmlSource - source code for the job
methodCode - key to a row in the method table
parent - the job_id of the job that is the parent; otherwise 0
isWarmStart - true for being a warm start job; false for otherwise
Returns:
key to the new row in the job table
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException
java.io.FileNotFoundException

jobHistory

public static java.sql.ResultSet jobHistory(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                            long jobId)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            SpkdbException
Get the state transition history for a given job.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
jobId - key to the given job in the job table
Returns:
Object of type java.sql.Resultset, containing a sequence of rows of the hhistory table, related to a given job.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

getJob

public static java.sql.ResultSet getJob(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                        long jobId)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                        SpkdbException
Get a given job.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
jobId - key to the given job in the job table
Returns:
Object of type java.sql.ResultSet interface, containing a single row of the job table.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

userJobs

public static java.sql.ResultSet userJobs(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                          long userId,
                                          int maxNum,
                                          long leftOff)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          SpkdbException
Get a sequence of jobs for a given user.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to the given user in user table
maxNum - maximum number of jobs to provide status for
leftOff - least jobId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence)
Returns:
Object of type java.sql.Resultset, containing a sequence of rows of the job table, belonging to a given user. Three fields, xml_source, cpp_source, and report, which are defined in the SQL schema to have type "longblob" are returned as java.sql.Blob types.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

endJob

public static boolean endJob(java.sql.Connection conn,
                             long jobId,
                             java.lang.String endCode,
                             java.lang.String report)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             SpkdbException
Record the end status of a job.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
jobId - key to the given job in the job table
endCode - the type of end that this job reached
report - final report
Returns:
true
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

newDataset

public static long newDataset(java.sql.Connection conn,
                              long userId,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String abstraction,
                              java.lang.String archive)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              SpkdbException
Add a new scientific dataset to the database.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to a user in the user table
name - name of this dataset (must be unique for the given user)
abstraction - short description of the dataset
archive - the entire data set in rcs-compatible format
Returns:
unique number, which is the key to the new row in the dataset table
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

getDataset

public static java.sql.ResultSet getDataset(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                            long datasetId)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            SpkdbException
Get a dataset.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
datasetId - key to a row in the dataset table
Returns:
Object of type java.sql.ResultSet, containing a row of the dataset table. The archive field, defined in the SQL schema as having type "longblob", is returned as type java.sql.Blob.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

updateDataset

public static boolean updateDataset(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                    long datasetId,
                                    java.lang.String[] name,
                                    java.lang.String[] value)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    SpkdbException
Update a row in the dataset table.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
datasetId - key to a row in the database table
name - array of column names (cannot contain "dataset_id")
value - array of column values
Returns:
true or false
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

userDatasets

public static java.sql.ResultSet userDatasets(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                              long userId,
                                              int maxNum,
                                              long leftOff)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                              SpkdbException
Get datasets belonging to a given user

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to the given user in the user table
maxNum - maximum number of datasets to return
leftOff - least datasetId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence)
Returns:
Object of a class which implements the java.sql.ResultSet interface, containing a sequence of rows of the job table belonging to the given user. Each row contains all columns of the dataset table. The archive field, which is defined in the SQL schema to have type "longblob", is returned as a java.sql.Blob type.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

newModel

public static long newModel(java.sql.Connection conn,
                            long userId,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String abstraction,
                            java.lang.String archive)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            SpkdbException
Add a new scientific model to the database.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to a user in the user table
name - name of this model (must be unique for the given user)
abstraction - short description of the model
archive - the entire model in rcs-compatible format
Returns:
unique number, which is the key to the new row in the model table
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

getModel

public static java.sql.ResultSet getModel(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                          long modelId)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          SpkdbException
Get a model

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
modelId - key to a row in the model table
Returns:
Object of type java.sql.ResultSet, containing a single row of the model table. The archive field, defined in the SQL schema has having type "longblob" is returned with type java.sql.Blob.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

userModels

public static java.sql.ResultSet userModels(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                            long userId,
                                            int maxNum,
                                            long leftOff)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            SpkdbException
Get a sequence of models belonging to a given user

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
userId - key to the given user in the user table
maxNum - maximum number of models to return
leftOff - least modelId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence)
Returns:
Object of a class which implements the java.sql.ResultSet interface, containing a sequence of rows of the job table belonging to the given user. Each row contains all columns of the model table. The archive field, which is defined in the SQL schema to have type "longblob" is returned as a java.sql.Blob type.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException

public static long newUser(java.sql.Connection conn,
                           java.lang.String[] name,
                           java.lang.String[] value)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           SpkdbException
Inserts a new user in the database, returning a unique key.

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
name - array of strings containing field names
value - array of values corresponding to field names in name
Returns:
long integer which is the unique key of the new row
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException
See Also:
connect(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

                                         java.lang.String username)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                         SpkdbException
Get a row from the user table

Parameters:
conn - open connection to the database
username - name which is an alternate key to the user table
Returns:
Object of a class which implements the java.sql.ResultSet interface, containing one complete row of the user table.

java.sql.SQLException
SpkdbException
